author: wn.com
title: Vacancy announcement (MOAF - Ministry of Agriculture and Forests of Bhutan)
text: ( Source : MOAF - Ministry of Agriculture and Forests of Bhutan ) The Central Machinery Unit , ( CMU ) Bumthang, under the Department of Agriculture is pleased to announce the vacancies for recruitment of ESP as Excavator operators on contract
